title: Jellyfish Salad Recipe
full_text:
Jellyfish Salad Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Cook
10 mins
Active
10 mins
Soaking Time
60 mins
Total
70 mins
Serves
4 servings
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1
package
jellyfish packed in salt
, about
10
ounces
2
tablespoons
garlic
, minced
2
green onions
, thiny sliced
1/4
cup
grapeseed oil
1/4
teaspoon
soy sauce
1
tablespoon
chili oil
1/4
teaspoon
salt
, or to taste
1
teaspoon
Sichuan peppercorns
, toasted and ground (optional)
A drizzle of
sesame oil
(optional)
Chopped cilantro
to garnish
Directions
To prepare the jellyfish, rinse it under cold running water. Then fill a large bowl with cold water and let the jellyfish soak for an hour, until the strands are supple and not salty. Drain and set aside.
Meanwhile, brown garlic and scallions in oil over low heat in a wok or sauté pan. When browned, add jellyfish and the rest of the ingredients. Mix thoroughly, then garnish with chopped cilantro. Serve slightly warm or cold.
Special Equipment
Large bowl
,
wok
or
sauté pan
Notes
Leftover jellyfish may be refrigerated for four to five days.
